## Load packages & data

```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(broom)
library(ggfortify)
library(pairwiseCI)
library(patchwork)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(reshape2)
library(readxl)
```

```{r load tdata, message = FALSE}
tdata1 <- read_excel("transaction_data_1-12.xlsx")
tdata2 <- read_excel("transaction_data_13-24.xlsx")
tdata3 <- read_excel("transaction_data_25-37.xlsx")
```

```{r merge tdata, message = FALSE}
tdata <- data.frame(tdata1, tdata2, tdata3)    
```

```{r load cdata, message = FALSE}
cdata <- read_excel("convfunnel_data.xlsx")
```
